detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.

Large waist bag in soft imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable fabric waist strap with a carabiner hook at one end. Taffeta lining made from recycled polyester. Depth 5.5 cm. Width 32 cm. Height 17 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Calf-length dress in softly draping silk with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and a high slit and draping at the front.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a printed cotton weave with elasticated smocking at the top and short sleeves.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from pima cotton containing some silk in a relaxed style with short slits in the sides.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathered seam at the waist, a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a sturdy weave with a sheen. Deep V-neck and a concealed zip at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams, a seam at the waist with a wide pleat and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist with a concealed drawstring and key pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Textured-knit tights designed to look like a pair of over-the-knee socks, with an elasticated waist.
Vest top in ribbed viscose-blend jersey with frill trims around the neckline and armholes.

Fitted, longer-style jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Welt front pockets, long sleeves with short slits at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short sleeves.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Lace playsuit with a V-neck and super-skinny, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.5 cm, total length 23 cm. Diameter of watch approx. 3.5 cm.
Moisturising lip balm in a box shaped like a unicorn. 3 g. Not for children under 3 years of age.
Pouch bag in transparent plastic with decorative plastic shells. Zip with a tab at the top. Height 21 cm. Length 28 cm.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and microfibre with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats for added volume and width. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide jumper in a soft double-knit wool blend with a lightly brushed finish, stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Longer, padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and flap front pockets with press-studs. Lined.
Short-sleeved jersey top.

Leather boots with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front with speed hooks at the top, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings, leather insoles and soles made from thermoplastic rubber (TPR). Heel 3 cm.
Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece that fasten down the front and along one leg. Ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Polo shirt in jacquard-patterned premium cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Long T-shirt in cotton jersey. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Lastingfit technology to retain the shape of the jeans for a consistent fit.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.

Trousers in an airy cotton weave. Relaxed fit with an elasticated waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and fake back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in velour with sequined embroidery, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Lined.
Lined bandeau bikini top with sturdy, padded cups, ties at the back, side support and detachable shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck.
WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layer, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.

Gently fitted, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, padded, hood with a faux fur trim. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal, zipped pockets, and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Maxi dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a long skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in jersey.

Lightweight windbreaker in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, lined, detachable hood with an elasticated edge, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt front pockets, adjustable elastication at the waist and elasticated cuffs. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Hard smartphone case in plastic with a glittery finish and text print. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Handbag in glittery, transparent plastic with an all-over print, a zip and two handles at the top and trims around the short sides. Width 10 cm. Height 13 cm. Length 19 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Soft, non-wired bras in jersey and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.

Soft, non-wired bralette in lace with mesh-lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, two rows of elastic and a lace trim at the hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft and zip in one side. Soft pile linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Rectangular sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in soft, airy cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Playsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated edge at the back. Elasticated seam and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs. Unlined.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back and a billowing, flounced trim at the top.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a decorative chiffon bow at the top and short puff sleeves.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed shawl neck, small embroidered detail at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey with gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Jacket in coated cotton twill with a detachable, pile-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing at the top, a wide V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a patent finish. Strap over the foot with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather linings, satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
